docs.lead_paragraph: In case it wasn't already clear that Barack Obama is going to have a lot to deal with when he takes office, the Government Accountability Office, Congress's investigative agency, has released a list of 13 urgent issues for him and the next Congress.

headline.main: It's Official: We've Got Problems, Folks . . .

docs.abstract: In case it wasn't already clear that Barack Obama is going to have a lot to deal with when he takes office, the Government Accountability Office, Congress's investigative agency, has released a list of 13 urgent issues for him and the next Congress. The 13, listed alphabetically by the G.A.O., are: Caring for Service Members [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: General Motors wants some forgiveness - $32 billion of it.

headline.main: G.M. Is Trying to Ease a Crushing Debt Load

docs.abstract: General Motors wants some forgiveness – $32 billion of it. As the Big Three Detroit automakers campaign for a federal bailout, G.M. is pleading with its anxious bankers and bondholders to lighten its debt burden, The New York Times's Zachery Kouwe reports. G.M. owes its creditors about $66 billion, but given its dire straits, there [...]
